mng: pit, threshold, one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing water, ☵
old variant of 坎[kan3], pit, hole

exm.mng: bumpy (of a road), rough (of life), to be down on one's luck, to be full of frustrations and dashed hopes
variant of 坎坷[kǎn kě], bumpy (of a road), rough (of life)
variant of 門檻|门槛[men2 kan3]
Chikan district of Zhanjiang city 湛江市[Zhan4 jiang1 shi4], Guangdong
